CustomField.description: This field shows CHANGES to the annual recurring amount commitment for the referenced product. The value can be positive, if the closed-won opportunity increases the annual recurring commitment, or negative, if the closed-won opportunity decreases the annual recurring commitment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field shows CHANGES to the annual recurring commitment for the referenced product. The value is positive, if the closed-won opportunity increases the annual commitment, or negative, if the closed-won opportunity decreases the annual commitment.
CustomField.label: Recurring Amount Change
